questions.question: It is more expensive ......................... I thought.
questions.description: Then is an adverb of time. In comparative expressions we use than.

questions.question: Chennai is ................................. Mumbai.
questions.description: We do not normally use 'the' before a comparative adjective + than.

questions.question: Susie is .............................. of the two sisters.
questions.description: When a group consists of just two people or things, we prefer the comparative to the superlative.

questions.question: Mary is ................................ student in the class.
He is not .............................. his brother.
questions.description: To say that people or things are not equal in a particular way we use the structure not as + adjective + as.

questions.question: The car is running ............................ since it had a service.
questions.description: Both smoothly and more smoothly are possible here. However, 'more smoothly' is the preferred form.

questions.question: It was ............................ dress I have ever worn.
It was ten times ............................... I expected.
questions.description: The expression 'three/four times + comparative' means the same as 'three/four times as much'.

questions.question: I can walk ................................. you.
questions.description: The expression 'three/four times + comparative' means the same as 'three/four times as much'.

questions.question: He is ................................ his brother.
questions.description: The structure 'three/four times + comparative' is not possible with words like 'twice' and 'half'.

questions.question: He explained it carefully, but I was still ..........................
The more information that comes in, .....................................
questions.description: In structures like these, the word order in both clauses is: the + comparative expression + subject + verb.
answers: the more confused is the picture
the more confused the picture is
the more is confused the picture
